tweet.text: Some of our historians grew up in Fairfax County, Virginia, and remember the great noise the Concorde supersonic airliner produced over their neighborhoods. This #FavoriteFRUS shows local issues can have international repercussions: https://t.co/fyJhQqVBWX 📷 @USNatArchives https://t.co/e4ujIe0GT3
